00082 //ADC pin configuration
00083 void adc_pin_config (void)
00084 {
00085  DDRF = 0x00; 
00086  PORTF = 0x00;
00087  DDRK = 0x00;
00088  PORTK = 0x00;
00089 }
00090 
00091 
00092 
00093 //Function to Initialize PORTS
00094 void port_init()
00095 {
00096  
00097  adc_pin_config();
00098   
00099 }
00100 
00101 
00102 
00103 
00104 
00105 void init_adc()
00106 {
00107  ADCSRA = 0x00;
00108  ADCSRB = 0x00;  //MUX5 = 0
00109  ADMUX = 0x20;  //Vref=5V external --- ADLAR=1 --- MUX4:0 = 0000
00110  ACSR = 0x80;
00111  ADCSRA = 0x86;  //ADEN=1 --- ADIE=1 --- ADPS2:0 = 1 1 0
00112 }
00113 
00114 //Function For ADC Conversion
00115 unsigned char ADC_Conversion(unsigned char Ch) 
00116 {
00117  unsigned char a;
00118  if(Ch>7)
00119  {
00120   ADCSRB = 0x08;
00121  }
00122  Ch = Ch & 0x07;     
00123  ADMUX= 0x20| Ch;      
00124  ADCSRA = ADCSRA | 0x40;  //Set start conversion bit
00125  while((ADCSRA&0x10)==0); //Wait for conversion to complete
00126  a=ADCH;
00127  ADCSRA = ADCSRA|0x10;
00128  ADCSRB = 0x00;
00129  return a;
00130 }
